Personal Dashboard
Volometrix Weekly Time Report

Weekly Time Report
View it in your browser.
 

Welcome to your new weekly progress report

Each week, we'll send you this summary of how you're spending your time, collaborating with coworkers and maintaining your work/life balance. You can set your personal goals by visiting the dashboard anytime to create and work towards a schedule that's best for you. Visit the resources page anytime to learn more about how we can calculate your report and to read tips on how to achieve your goals.


  

Here is your weekly progress.
April 27 – May 3

Reclaim your time

Attended effective meetings
% of the meetings you attended met meeting effectiveness targets. This is above your target of %.
Learn more

Met Goal of Prioritizing Work/Think Time
You had X days with at least one 2-hour block of time to think / work, compared to your goal of Y.
Learn more

Prioritized off time.
You spent X days working after hours this week. This is less than your goal
Learn more

Be a mindful coworker

Organized effective meetings
% of the meetings you organized met meeting effectiveness targets.
Learn more

Opportunity to improve meeting effectiveness
Only X% of the meetings you organized met meeting effectiveness targets..
Learn more

Respect coworkers’ time
Colleagues spent x hours attending your meetings or reading your emails.
Learn more

Think before you send
You spent an average of X hours on email this week.
Learn more

The information above is meant to provide you with the tools and information you need to have efficient and effective workdays. Your progress is private and generated exclusively for your own knowledge. Treat this and your personal dashboard as a directional tool as you schedule meetings and communicate with your colleagues.
You are receiving this email because you have chosen to allow us to gather anonymous information about your company. We are constantly improving our product, your comments and questions are important to us.
We'd like to hear from you, please send us your feedback!

The first time a user gets the email, this intro is visible.
